title: Postcard from Perth
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, Eric Thompson and Shan Benson
brief_description: Perth, far removed from the main centres of Austraian life and industry, is a quiet and peaceful city [1954]. Folks relax and do not seem to hurry. This film reflects somewhat, the leisure and and activities of the people of Perth in the 1950s.
